name: Noggle Statue - Mania
description: A small wobbly statue of Stalker's Acolyte, Mania.

languages.description: Eine kleine Wackelfigur vom Akolythen des Stalkers, Wahn.
languages.name: Noggle-Statue: Wahn

languages.description: Une petite statue à tête oscillante de Folie, un des disciples du Stalker.
languages.name: Statuette Noggle - Folie

languages.description: Una statuetta del discepolo dello Stalker, Mania, con la testa tremolante.
languages.name: Statuetta Noggle - Mania

languages.description: 스토커의 어콜라이트, 매니아의 갸웃거리는 작은 인형입니다.
languages.name: 노글 스태츄 - 매니아

languages.description: Una pequeña y tambaleante estatua de uno de los discípulos de Stalker, Manía.
languages.name: Estatua Tambaleante - Manía

languages.description: 一小座追猎者追随者躁狂摇头娃娃
languages.name: 躁狂摇头娃娃

languages.description: Stalkerの従者のボブルヘッド人形、Mania。
languages.name: Mania ボブルヘッド

languages.description: Mała, chwiejna figurka akolity Stalkera: Mania.
languages.name: Figurka Noggle — Mania

languages.description: Uma estatueta articulada de um discípulo do Stalker, Paranoia.
languages.name: Estatueta: Paranoia

languages.description: 一小座 Stalker 的追隨者－躁狂的搖頭娃娃。
languages.name: 躁狂搖頭娃娃

languages.description: รูปปั้นตุ๊กตาหัวโยกขนาดเล็กของผู้ช่วยเหลือ Stalker - Mania
languages.name: รูปปั้น Noggle - Mania

languages.description: Stalker Acolyte, Mania küçük oynar figür.
languages.name: Noggle Heykeli - Mania

languages.description: Статуетка прибічника Сталкера на ім’я Манія.
languages.name: Ноґл «Манія»
